page.title: 14LUPTON FAMILY 1985
page.content: In my family there are my sister and I,my Mum and Dad.We live in caravan that my Dad built.We are going to build a house. We have a televsion.Our favourite type of programmes are nature and comedy cartoons. Our favourite type of book is non-fiction,fiction and adventure and childrens fiction books. We burn wood on the rayburn for heating.We use electricity for lighing. My Dad's favourite food is Rice and vegtables my Mum's is Rogan jush my favourite food is Rogan jush my sister's favourite food is spaghetti. We have 2 cats,5 ducks,2 bantams,1 hen and 4 kittens. My Dads hobby is walking.My Mums hobby is writing songs.My hobby is card making.We have a boat for leisure.
